website_summaries.verdict: One of the best, affordable diversion safes that fits virtually anywhere there is a bookshelf.
pros: Plenty of interior space for small objects
Book safe fits on any flat surface like a book shelf or coffee table
Comes with a three-digit combination lock for extra security
cons: Stored items must be slim to fit

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my younger brother. He hasn't used it yet because it's going to be an Xmas present, but it seems pretty cool. I ordered the large one, and it looks like you can fit a lot of stuff in the safe. It came with instructions on how to set your own password code, and has ridges to look like pages. ***If helpful, please click 'Helpful'*** :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Pistol
customer_reviews.text: The top is made with real dictionary-type soft covering which affects the durability but truly makes it looks 100% like a dictionary! A perfect diversion safe for a medium sized pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Stacked horizontally with other books, you can't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It isn't made to be Fort Knox. No need to be, since you think it's a book. Stacked horizontally with other books, you can't tell the difference. This day and age, nobody ever asks to use a dictionary.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels like a real book. The pages are plastic, but will work well with the spine facing forward. It has a lot of room in it, you could easily store money and important documents. Possibly even a small hand gun. It came in fabulous condition, and you can change the password. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: #Pet Stylist

customer_reviews.title: Hide your valuables in plain sight
customer_reviews.text: This book safe was just what I wanted. It looks very much like a dictionary on my bookshelf, but hidden inside is a locking safe with a combination lock. I was able to hide my valuables inside and tuck the "book" inside my bookshelf to keep them safe. The spine of the book has a realistic look so I fits right in.
customer_reviews.author: French 75

customer_reviews.title: Hide your valuables in plain site
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I expected this to be more than a little bit cheesy and was prepared when I ordered it to send it back once I received it; but, when I put it on the shelf beside all of my other reference books no one would have a clue that it's not a real dictionary. Easy to use. Easy Access. Well done manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: WSC

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Safe/discreet place to store my journal or anything else I may decide to keep in it. Outer texture of book safe feels/looks just like a book
customer_reviews.author: 'Nique

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE!! This!!! It's so cute, the outside is so believable. Wish the page part was more believable because up close u can tell it's not a real book but if u were to put it on a shelf with other books facing in, it would totally pass for a real book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, cool design
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome. Looks like a real dictionary! The one issue I have is that the cover was warped when I bought it so it does not close like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a stash to hide money away from my roommate. I t works great, she does not suspect a thing. She thinks it is a book and she does not read. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Hasani

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when you slide it into a bookshelf with other books, but if you want to leave it on a desk, or put it sideways on top of other books, the "pages" are OBVIOUSLY very fake. They are very bright white plastic, that just sticks out obviously. But other than that, this product will do the trick. I feel like my cash is safe inside, because now people can only see the spine, and it looks just like any other dictionary.
customer_reviews.author: TiahnaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Like The Image And Description
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I are extremely happy with our purchase. We ordered the large book safe and it fits the description to a 'T'. Also, we are happy with the ability to set our own combination for the lock (the directions are very clear and illustrated). It honestly looks extremely close to a book. You wouldn't know otherwise unless you picked it up and opened it. We ran into a problem with the packaging but the seller messaged us back the same day and corrected it. Overall, great seller and I strongly recommend this product to those who are looking for a book safe.
customer_reviews.author: mercedes jenkins

customer_reviews.title: so the fact it was useless hurt my heart
customer_reviews.text: We set the first passcode (by folloing directions) yet it locked us out and i have never been able to use this! This was a Christmas gift to my teenage son, so the fact it was useless hurt my heart!
customer_reviews.author: Kylar Moore

customer_reviews.title: The size of a paperback novel
customer_reviews.text: This little safe looks just like another book in my classroom. Sizewise, it's a little bit bigger than a paperback novel, so, not made for anything too large. The biggest drawback is that the combination is limited to a three digit number that you program. It's perfect for my needs. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LadyFaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a safe that didn't look like a safe. This is perfect! It looks and feels just like a book. And there is no way my teenagers will be reaching for a dictionary! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Baxter Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great surprise
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an 8 yr old. What a hoot! He thought it was a real book, as did everyone at the birthday party. When he discovered it was,a safe, it quickly became is favorite gift. It is well made and nice and big. The combination is easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Howell

customer_reviews.title: Can not get it to open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift and my son was so excited to open it yesterday and start using it. Unfortunately it will NOT open after setting the combination once. We followed the instructions exactly (and my other son’s works which we set up the same way) but not we can not get into it using the set password or factory setting. Unfortunately I do my Christmas shopping early, and bought this October and the return window closed in November. :( Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie D.

customer_reviews.title: It is disfunctional
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as instructed. I set the new numbers for the code and it locked it. When I went to open it again, it jammed on me and will not open. This fells like a serious waste of money. The one I had before with a key worked nicely. I am not sure what the problem is with this book safe. Imagine if you truly needed to get something out of the safe like a will, passport, or social security card, now you a stuck with an option of breaking this book open with a sledge hammer or using a crow bar to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Artofspeech

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this product is so bad that I had to warn people. I read the instructions on how to set up my new combo and did everything correctly. Was able to open with my new combo 3 times in less than 2 days....1st 2 times was just testing new combo. Not even 2 full days and safe has locked me out after 4th time trying to open it with correct combo. Now have to waste my time figuring out how to get my stuff out and then return to Amazon. Maybe mine is just defective....because somehow this product has lots of great reviews. This was just my honest experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I like this book/ safe it good to hide stuff from ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this book/ safe it good to hide stuff from my son, he is at the stage of exploring so if you have kids and want to hide stuff from them this is perfect for you. Its big inside and can fit a lot of important goods. The only down side to me is if you look at it side ways you can tell its a fake book. The paper is made out of plastic mold. But if its facing you and next to another book on your book shelf it will pass! Thats why its a 4 star not a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It works and the combo is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient little safe to have. The combo set up was extremely easy to set up. The space is good for like some cash, important documents, or a compact handgun. It definitely is noticeable that it is not a real book when you're holding it In your hands but once on the bookshelf along with other books you would never think it's something other than a book. It's not a safe that is super strong it can be busted open with the right tools but for something minor to hide and have a back up lock on it In case it's found this thing is great. It beats the under your matress stash spot for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Purchased it for my 10-year-old great-niece. She loves to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my 10-year-old great-niece. She loves to read and has some kind of fascination with combination locks. When she opened it, she replied “sweeeeet”. But while changing the combination it became unglued, less than 30 minutes out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA L. YOSHIOKA

customer_reviews.title: Okay, if you don't care if it locks...
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it was just my particular unit, or maybe I'm just simple, but following the instructions, I could not get the combination to take. The instructions photos were of a different type of lock, but I tried to follow as best I could. The lock is incredibly cheap, which is fair enough since the idea is stealth, but I think it's reasonable to expect it to work and also worry about putting important items in this without solid faith it will actually open. Only positive I would offer is it does do a good job of pretending to be a book.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for teen
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little cash boxes for teens. It looks and feels exactly like a little book unless you look closely and pick it up you wouldn't notice. They used to leave their cash in a bin in their room or a drawer which is easily accessible, but now its safer from friend sleepovers, cleaners, and other sticky hands. Closes tightly, seems like good quality, and lock is easy to set up with the instructions given.
customer_reviews.author: CallMeKenzi

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe, but a safe hiding place
customer_reviews.text: The singular security feature of this is that it blends in perfectly with a bookshelf, the fact that it locks is totally useless. I could probably smash into it in about 5 seconds, and that's not a boast: Most people over the age of 12 probably could. That said, I gave it a 4 in the sturdiness department because the *flimsy* locking mechanism and thin metal lining is honestly superfluous. The idea of this thing is that nobody finds it in the first place, and it does that so well I didn't even bother setting a code on the lock, I just consider it a latch to make sure nothing falls out when I take it off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend who is a voracious reader and appreciates out of the ordinary gifts. She has had a few odd points in her life where her apartment had been violated and I thought this would make a nice gift for her to stash a few important pieces of heirloom jewelry AND it was for her 50th birthday. While it seems quite mundane, it actually looks and feels like an ordinary book. I believe if you made sure the items you stashed in it didn't rattle around, someone would pass it over after grabbing it off the shelf. It's quite genius actually!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hurteau Shoen

customer_reviews.title: Back binding arrived unglued!
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, strong plastic fake pages, look real. Book cover is real, looks like a real dictionary. Safe is steel and combination works good. But opened mine up and looked it over and the inside back binding was already unglued from the plastic! Wow! Will try squeezing some gorilla glue back there and if that don’t hold I’ll send it back. Needs better glue, quality control or both.
customer_reviews.author: SpikeO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this to be a fire-proof safe to protect your family heirlooms, but it is a nifty thing for protecting your personal items. For an idea of how much can fit inside there, expect the Large sizing to fit 8" inches of stuff inside (length wise). It could be great for fitting tons of papers or trinkets. The exterior build quality is really nice and alike a book. However, the plastic "pages" might be too revealing in some cases. More importantly, remember to switch the underpanel's switch from the B side to A after you set the code you desire.
customer_reviews.author: kota

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but not super secure
customer_reviews.text: I have some stuff I keep it at home, and want to keep it a little hidden and not to obvious. This one serves all what I need. It does look like a real book and blend in well with other books. It's not super secure lock system but nice enough to keep the stuff. I forgot my password and contacted via email. I was able to recover it back, i thought i had to break it but that wasn't the case. Overall is great, but don't put high values stuff there, it's easy for someone to come grab it and open it.
customer_reviews.author: KaKa

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this but good for adults too
customer_reviews.text: My son (5) wanted a bank for his money that he normally kept in a shoebox. He was so excited that this was a secret place for his money. The part he likes the most is the combination dial! Although it is for his “secret stash” he can’t help but tell everyone and show his lock box. All his change makes it heavy but it has been sturdy and durable for sure. * This also makes a decent lock box for an adult and isn’t very noticeable as a little safe.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Draws attention away
customer_reviews.text: Product was easier to change passcode than it looks on directions shown above, but a bit small, it couldn’t fit both my iPhone 11 and AirPods at the same time unless I positioned them a certain way. The purpose of this is to draw attention away because who would think that it’s a book safe from looking at it?
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It looked great in person and wouldn't stand out on a bookcase! You have to pick it up to realize it's not a regular book. It was also sturdy. I had trouble setting the password but I reached out to JSSMST customer service directly (their contact information is on the instructions) and they responded immediately and were very helpful! It truly is uncrackable so be sure to know your password or keep it saved somewhere safe because once you set it, you can't undo it! I definitely recommend it and heartily applaud the customer service from JSSMST!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a damn good safe. I'd keep it in the upright position if you have it exposed. The "pages" look real from afar.
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. I would recommend putting it in a bookshelf or if not so having it stacked with other things. It truly does look like a book on the exterior. The side view of the "pages" isn't noticeable unless one looks close. I tried this safe and kept testing it but its a good buy. I like the fact that it's relatively small as well not to mention the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Flemington

customer_reviews.title: Great discreet safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe as a gift for my friend. There were a few items he has that he did not want his 3 1/2 year old daughter to see. He loves it and it is perfect for his needs Someone could definitely break into this safe if they really wanted to but as a deterrent it works great The pages are pretty obviously fake if you look close enough but on a shelf you would have no idea it is not a real book I am very happy with this purchase and definitely recommend this safe
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Item - One Small Complaint
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a very nice item... it looks "normal" on my bookshelf, and the subject (New English Dictionary) is boring enough that my kids won't grab it by accident. My one complaint is that the spine is not at a right angle (90 degrees) to the front and back covers. The spine is slightly offset, and so the book looks "crooked" on the bookshelf. When being glued together, they should have used an angle or block to hold it correctly. Other than that, it's still worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis De Payne

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated customer service
customer_reviews.text: There was a small problem with the product, so I called the support number provided on the box. Ken was determined to make it right and never stopped until I had a perfectly working product in hand. The safe is of decent size, looks remarkably like a dictionary. The combination can be customzed easily. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbo

customer_reviews.title: The safe itself looks like a book and setting it up was easy
customer_reviews.text: The safe itself looks like a book and setting it up was easy. Somehow the lock reset itself though after a few uses and I couldn't use the combination anymore. It's not super safe though, I stuck a screwdriver in the side and it popped right up with little force.
customer_reviews.author: Logan R

customer_reviews.title: Works great, shotty aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: The locking part is great and exactly what I was looking for to lock up remotes at night from littles who want to sneak out of bed and watch tv! But the book itself I’m not super happy with. It looked great when it arrived, but after minimal use it’s already fraying/wearing on the edge that opens. I hoped for sturdier construction than just a few weeks use causing damage. But the function is more important to me than looks I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and looks convincing.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with this item. It holds a lot of valuables and the lock is a nice touch. I liked it so much that I bought it for my mother too. Of course, if someone picks it up, it will be heavy, but that’s not likely to happen if it’s on a bookcase. My husband is a retired police officer, and he told me burglars want to get in and out in five minutes or so; they don’t mess around looking through bookcases or under sinks, so diversion safes are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: American Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of these little safes
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these little safes one for each of my parents who reside in Nursing homes and one for myself. Easy to setup. I put mine on my bookshelf and 3 weeks later I couldn't remember where I put it. My husband came in and pulled it right off the shelf alongside my other dictionary. I knew what I was looking for and still missed it. It is realistic as a dictionary. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using for home money safe
customer_reviews.text: This is cool. It’s not very durable, like if somebody stole it, they could easily bust it open. So you’d be counting on the camouflage to hide it from them. I just bought it to keep my kids from sterling our money, so it’s perfect, a cheap way to do that. The inside is just barely longer than bills.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sanich

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended to get something like this for college to hide ...
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended to get something like this for college to hide meds and valuables. My only comment is make something with more titles like shakespeare or classics - my daughters friend picked it up right away saying " why do you have this giant dictionary" because they are all online now. Still it's a cool safe - we'll just put it away and not in sight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real book - strong metal box inside
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed that it was a full size dictionary. The cover is nicely bound and has realistic pages. Many of these are suspiciously decorated without a title on the spine. The box inside is strong and it is easy to set the combination. They offer it with a key also. Preferred the combination over risking losing a key. Good quality, will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: martin cabela

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem, get it?
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to have, living in an apartment where there is not much space for a “safe”. Plus with others having access to entering your apartment like maintance and leasing office, you never can be sure about valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The Lock passcode
customer_reviews.text: I bought the box with the code, it was the first time I used it, so I was accidently lock it, I tried to find the password to open it but i cant, I texted them and ask for help, they did help me out, but the lock couldnt open, then they sent me another box for FREE. They are very nice, because I said I would pay it back but they didn't take it.
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: Instructions, ease to set up
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear and easy ti follow. I put the password on the instruction page then put it in the safe without writing it down elsewhere! I don't recommend doing that! i chose something simple so I remembered it right away. Recommendation: write down your password somewhere besides putting it inside the safe!! Very sturdy and looks like a real dictionary...blends right in on my shelf. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tina seaman

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Well I got the item and it was great. Great interior, lots of room. But the lock somehow got stuck when I was setting the combination. Wrote the company, they wrote back immediately and were incredibly nice and proactive, and have already shipped me a new one. You can't beat that! Its nice to know you can buy something and if it doesn't work out, there is help available. First class!
customer_reviews.author: C. Park

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Lock works perfectly. I bought for my boyfriends birthday gifts because he was going to be away and he couldn't open it until I have him to code. It could of been the fact his luggage got tossed around but the edge of the dictionary started peeling and got a smooshed. Overall great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Alves

customer_reviews.title: Works but is super fake looking.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a librarian and I have a decent sized home library so a book safe seemed perfect for a small hiding place. I didn’t expect the book safe to be perfect but I also didn’t expect it to look as cheap and fake as it does in person. After the first order was lost in the mail, I didn’t want the hassle of returning this one. I beat up the edges a little with an X-Acto knife and my fiancé painted the “pages” to look worn. Good enough for what it’s for.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept behind this, but the smaller size really isn't functional. Its too small to keep anything really important in. The "pages" could also be a little more realistic. From the spine it looks legit, but from the top or the side you can tell that the pages are molded plastic and hence, not a real book.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good for minor privacy/protection. You get what you pay for, read negatives below.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Discolors easy if moisture/heat gets on it 2. Up close it's easy to tell it's not a real book 3. You could EASILY break into it within a minute with JUST a normal hammer. It's good if you don't trust someone who you are living with, and you want peace of mind knowing they can't access or things without you knowing.
customer_reviews.author: Cormag

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy gift! My son saw these at a craft fair made from real books for $80, no way, but thanks Amazon! This has a real hard cover feel, but the “pages” are plastic formed. From a distance looks real. It has an easy 3 digit code access. Be sure to write it down if giving to a kid because there is no reset function.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: combonation sticks
customer_reviews.text: combo sticks to code. making it VERY easy to guess the combo. just roll until its difficult and your in.
customer_reviews.author: Notes

customer_reviews.title: A decent deciever
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and effective against common thieves. Just be sure they don't get a "feel" of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not well built
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, and clearly read over the instructions on how to set/reset the locking mechanism. After following the instructions, I set the new lock number, closed it.... turned the locking mechanism one time... and it completely fell apart. What a shame. It locked nice
customer_reviews.author: Caliuso

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real book and hides small valuables easily!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock box. We have many workers around our house, and it is a great box to keep small items safe (money, checks, medicine). It looks like a book in a drawer, so no one would expect it. It is safe, but you could open it with a hammer. So keep that in mind for how much protection you need.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dent

customer_reviews.title: one way looked like 116 to me
customer_reviews.text: Bear in mind which way you're looking at it to set your lock combo... one way looked like 116 to me, but the other way it's 911! Thought it was broken and almost broke into it.(the only way to open it if you forget your combo, by the way). But otherwise, a great little keeper.
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: I Want to Buy More Fake Books
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to use. Hopefully it's not as easy to break into. I don't have experience with that-yet. This book is blended into a stack of books in a random drawer, who'd ever guess? I have a large prescription bottle on its side in there and a few other predictable things. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a hidden safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in order to lock away cash and medications. I like the size and the ability to disguise the safe, however, I'm finding that the dials to turn for the combination are kind of "sticky" and I'm hoping that they do not stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Xerran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd color. These safes look so much like books that no one would ever know. These are perfect to hide important docs, money or anything you want to keep safe. They are not fire or water proof. So make sure to save these if a flood or fire occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Carey I

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to read numbers.  Very small inside
customer_reviews.text: I keep my pills next to my bed in a weekly container. Now that my granddaughter almost got them I smartened up fast This is great. Only downfall is trying to read the little numbers! I need a flashlight and reading glasses. FYI
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than I Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Using this to hide clues for a murder mystery game I created. Only knock, it's a lot smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: It’s a safe!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed upon first opening the box. Looks like a real book. You can hear the springs in the safe lock hinges when you shake it, which I assume will disappear with weight but other than that I’m glad I purchased it. I needed a safe and wanted something that’ll blend in.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job, looks realistic from all angles if you don’t suspect anything, I just wish I read the dimensions because I am using it to hide letters and it isn’t long enough to hold (rather long) envelopes, I can fit them in but the ends bend upwards, I have to work with what I have and in that case it has still been very helpful. Only complaint (shipment complaint) is that it shipped in the item’s box not a shipping box, meaning anybody who could’ve gotten the mail before me would have known that I bought this and would have destroyed the whole purpose.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great way to 'hide' valuables
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this book safe for my college student, who has roommates. The book safe hides in plain sight and gives a little piece of mind. Easy to use. Roomy enough inside to stash cash, passport, credit cards, ID. Would certainly recommend this book safe and would purchase others in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ann F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Secure, Easy Lock change, Actually looks decent when on a bookshelf! A+
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Very simple to change the password and when on a shelf it actually looks real. I love hidden stash items I find them great. I actually did not really even need this safe at this time but I saw it and just had to buy it. A+
customer_reviews.author: TinyToes8

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the $
customer_reviews.text: If someone really really want to get in they probably can pry their way in but if you just want to keep something out of hands of someone in your house that would be too tempted if that object was just lying around, this is perfect little safe. Easy to set and use. Good value for the money and purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brouczech77

customer_reviews.title: Dementions off
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is fine, but the inner dementions listed are incorrect. The description says 1.6 inches but that only applies to half the box. The other half has a recess for the lock, which halfed the with. I wasnt unable to use it for the reason I purched it. But I'm trying to find some other use as it is an interesting product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Grube

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight safe, good for escape rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little safe. I used it for escape rooms and it worked perfectly. I think it is a good hiding place, but if someone really wanted to break into it I doubt they'd have much trouble. However, it is a good little decoy and sturdy enough for escape rooms! It has a 3-number combination you can set and reset.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun little hidden safe
customer_reviews.text: like other reviewers wrote, this can definitely be broken into, but it keeps an honest person out of your private goods. I use this to store my passport, social sec, and other goods that I don't want others getting their hands on.
customer_reviews.author: oo0hNoo0

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is great, looks just as advertised. Pages are plastic and if you look close you can see that. But not at a glance! Love the changeable combination lock. Fooled my family for months😉!
customer_reviews.author: James J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Not really a safe...
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a safe.... would take zero effort to break it open. Or, for that matter, for someone to simply stick it in their hand bag and take it. I really can’t think of an occasion when anyone would need a safe that has little protective value.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Change from first review.
customer_reviews.text: The seller promptly contacted me and offered to send me a new safe. The new one functions as it should and hasn't fallen apart like the last one. Five stars for customer service. Thank you. First Review: I carried this in my bag with a laptop and important documents. They made it without a scratch, but this “safe” didn’t?
customer_reviews.author: Justin Daniels

customer_reviews.title: What goes in it.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely inconspicuous. The main thing I would mention is to think about what you are going to put in this. Because when you go to stand the “book” on the shelf everything will go to the bottom of the “book “. If that is ok then it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY clever and concealable!
customer_reviews.text: This "dictionary" is great!! It truly looks like a "real" dictionary. It's a perfect way to hide valuables on your bookshelf. Setting the 3-digit password is simple, and the instructions are straightforward. Keep in mind that this product is not secure like a traditional steel safe. What makes it unique is that it is very concealable. Very clever!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Super Low-key
customer_reviews.text: I brought to have a place for my passport and car title. Plus it looks super cool on my bookshelf. It's east to program and east to access. It's not for stacks on deck or big things of value. it only holds but so much.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for Holiday gifts. Both an 8 year old and a 30 year old were so excited with the gift. Perfect for hiding your important things when living with a large family or roommates too. Very pleased with the quality and response as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Clear printing
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this book, I can't wait to unpack the product. The print is very clear and the paper quality is good. I chose a few books. Finally, I chose this book because of its high quality and low price. My family said this book is very good. Next time I will choose your store to buy products.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Kachele

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a secret hiding place for those little things!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old grandson and he uses it all the time. He will only accept $1 bills for wages, rewards, etc. I don't find money laying around any more, just this 'dictionary'. I have thought about buying a second one for me, but.... Definitely a good gift or article to have around if you have money laying around the house. So easy to throw in even if not locked.
customer_reviews.author: Bombshell67

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing idea and so cleaver. I received the book safe and set it up, and after a few days I wanted to open it but unfortunately didn’t work. The company followed up with me after the purchase to ask me how I am satisfied with the product. I told them that I have an issue and sent me the instructions how to unlock but it seemed to complicated. Seeing that I was obviously upset because I couldn’t remember the lock combination, they sent me a brand new one! I am delighted with their customer service and prompt response. I would highly recommend them. Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: hajredinpasha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This book safe is perfect disguise to keep valuables safe. The book safe comes in two types- lock and key or number lock. I prefer number lock obviously, as there is no risk of losing the physical keys.
customer_reviews.author: Palak Shah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for both our boys for Christmas. They both have aspirations of becoming international spys... shoot I shouldn't have said that. Anyways, they love them... for completely mundane, non-spy related activities.
customer_reviews.author: P. Travis Millet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for a cheap little book safe. Make sure you buy one that says "upgraded: metal lock tumblers" or something like that. I guess some of these come with plastic dials for the lock...
customer_reviews.author: Burr

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this book safe. It is very sturdy and fits in as a normal book in my book shelf, in fact, I have ordered a second one. Do not want to keep all my eggs in one basket so to speak. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: BB76

customer_reviews.title: Nice little safe
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised by how sturdy this thing actually is & by how much is resembles an actual dictionary. I mean, I think an intelligent thief could probably find a way to cut into it. It's not a bank vault. But, it'll keep personal possessions out of the hands of kids, siblings, roommates, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great for a college dorm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter’s dorm room but had a problem and the box locked and would not open! I contacted the manufacturer and they explained the one I received was a returned one since it did not have plastic wrapping on it. They quickly sent out a new one and I set the passcode and had no issues! Fingers crossed we have no other issues but for now, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Frank

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea and the product, don't know yet if the password works, haven't tried it yet. It was dented on one corner and the face of the "book" was scratched, some of the silver came off and the paper on the cover torn.
customer_reviews.author: mare

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to change combination. Room for passport, money, extra credit cards. My only complaint is that shipping label was attached directly to the box (no shipping box) and covered the directions, Luckily, they were on the Amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: No Keys to Lose or have Stolen.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that used a key. Someone stole one of my keys so I threw the safe away because I no longer had both keys. The combination lock on this one prevents that. Setting your combination is easy as is accessing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Save your $.
customer_reviews.text: Initially it seemed fine. About a week later when i went to open it, i dialed the combo, gave the knob a twist and heard a metal clink. It opened and the latch was no longer attached. The c clip that holds it in place had come off and doesnt want to go back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Cichlid Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a cheaper version of a hidden book safe, I came to find that it did not have enough space in the hidden compartment. After I returned my original purchase, I purchased this product and found it to be a better quality product. One recommendation would be if the manufacturer would add a few loose pages in the front to give the hidden compartment more concealment.
customer_reviews.author: Octavian

customer_reviews.title: Lock did setting did not work numbers on lock are very hard to see
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. The lock did not store the code I entered, the numbers on the lock wheels are difficult to see. This is very easy to break into. The door is held on by a simple metal wire on the hinges, the wire is easy to simply pull out and the door will open. My 12 year old opened it in about 10 minutes when we could not get the lock to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Bill.G

customer_reviews.title: A cool hidden safe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these for an escape game I put together at work. They are high quality, look hidden when placed with other books and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pry open when locked
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a perfect way to keep my teenage son from getting his phone when his attitude is what got it taken away. I went to the store, and he was able to pry it open with scissors and get his phone out. Now before you judge my parenting skills- he felt tremendously guilty that he was able to accomplish this, and immediately put it back, AND told me about it. What I’m trying to say is, if someone wants what is in this box, they’ll get it!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: PROS Product is sturdy and it looks like a real dictionary. It comes with instructions on how to set the lock that are easy to understand. CONS The product is noisy when moved around even if it is handled gently and even if it's empty.
customer_reviews.author: Manolo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This product arrived damaged & extremely unsatisfacted. It looks neat if it wasn’t all banged up.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived to me damaged, overall it looks pretty neat but I’m very upset that is was damaged before actually opening it. Hopefully if I decide to get another one the next one won’t be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Newman

customer_reviews.title: Is like a real book
customer_reviews.text: you can leave in between books easily and won’t be noticed. The seller team is so nice and responsible that makes me like it even more! I chose de small size and is perfect to keep phones, small devices or even cash. The inside material is all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Be Secure Without Being So Obvious
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to keep important items secure while being hidden in plain sight. It looks and feels like a real book and enables me to place it with the rest of my books.
customer_reviews.author: chibilee02

customer_reviews.title: Bullet proof safe that nobody can find!
customer_reviews.text: The safe is so sneaky I can’t even find where it is in my bookshelf! It’s probably bulletproof sound proof waterproof and fireproof as well. I would leave diamonds and gold in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke the day delivered
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered two of these, and the lock broke that same day... the other one seems fine. But my window to return the broken one just closed yesterday.. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

product_meta.title: Book Safe with Combination Lock - Jssmst Home Dictionary Diversion Metal Safe Lock Box, SM-BS0405S, Navy Small
feature_bullets: ADVANTAGES: Jssmst is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended, we are engaged in the production and export of lock boxes for more than ten years
VARIOUS SIZES AND COLORS AVAILABLE: three colors(black, navy and red), two sizes(small and large size)
EXTERIOR DIMENTIONS: 7.2 x 4.6 x 2.2 inches (small size), 9.5 x 6.2 x 2.2 inches (large size) INSIDE STORAGE AREA MEASURES: 6.5 x 4.3 x 1.6 inches(small size), 9.2 x 5.7 x 1.6 inches(large size)
WITH COMBINATION LOCK: don’t worry about losing keys. If you’re not sure about setting up password or forget the password, please contact Jssmst friendly support team for quick solutions
